name: Cyborg Till You Dieborg
description:
Well its the future, you're a cyborg ninja. Stuffs pretty cool, right! Except your job is to exterminate the current pests until, well, you break down. But that doesn't mean you can't make your job fun!

Cut down Globs and Grobs, get higher scores. This is an easy unwind game for very casual sessions. If you beat 35, let me know, that's around my best score :D. This game is free for all time. If you see someone trying to sell it, take em down!

Controls

Arrows - Move around

Z - Slash

X - Dash

Space - Start/Restart
